data.name: Qbike: Synthwave Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Qbike: Cyberpunk Motorcycles by listening to the retro electro tunes of talented modern synth-wave and electronic artists who participated to make Qbike atmosphere unique and memorable.

Total listening time: 3:06:57
Tracks are provided in .mp3 format 320 kb/s

Artists in alphabetical order:
Please, follow the instructions included to support them for making these tracks free for you!

CryseHD


  • Blood And Fire [4:00]
  • Departure [7:00]
  • Ignition [5:30]
  • Streets Of LA [4:44]
  • The Chase [3:44]
  • Highway Avenger [3:54]
  • Night Drive [3:41]
  • Revolution [8:13]

DJ Caile


  • Cosmic [2:52]
  • The Rude [3:44]
  • Velocity [2:57]

Isidor


  • Grid Surfer [4:09]
  • Into the Dragon's Lair [3:11]
  • Metropolis X [4:23]
  • Solaris Rising [3:30]
  • Star Sheriff [3:25]

The Judgeman


  • Jack Out [3:00]
  • Press Start [3:23]
  • Raptor 909 [3:16]

Murkula


  • Degenerate [4:37]
  • Diva Design [4:48]
  • Repent In Tec [4:15]
  • TRNDKLLR [4:53]

Mythical Vigilante


  • Cocaine Cowboy [3:44]
  • Synthesizer [3:56]
  • The Mind Manipulator's Murder Disco [4:18]
  • Welcome Back To The Grid [2:36]
  • -vs- The Computer [4:54]

Oolong


  • Acid Rain [3:20]
  • Light Cycle [4:47]
  • Memory [4:57]

Retro Thunder


  • Cool_Runnings [3:10]
  • Inspire [4:46]
  • T90 [2:50]
  • Total_Recall [3:42]

Starman


  • Addict [3:31]
  • Appreciation [3:23]
  • Only Human [3:37]

Sub Morphine


  • Cruzer [4:05]
  • Neon Cruiser [4:21]
  • Journey to Mars [4:44]
  • Virtual Space [5:32]
  • Viper [3:54]
  • Voyager [4:33]

• Please note – Qbike: Synthwave Soundtrack will be placed in your Qbike: Cyberpunk Motorcycles folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Qbike: Cyberpunk Motorcycles\Qbike: Synthwave Soundtrack
